title: The Beach is Fun! - 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Hmmm... what to do...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Are you really that worried over this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Because! This’ll decide who wins! We’ve gotta pick the best beach ball~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Rentals are first come, first serve, so if we spend too much time worrying over which one to pick, there won’t be any good ones left.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>You’re right~! Ah~, what to do, what to choose? The watermelon one is cute, the one with the rabbit design on it would make Ayumu-chan happy, and I think Chika-chan would like the one with the mikan...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>There’s also one with onigiri on it... Hanayo would definitely like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmmm~... Alright, I’ve decided! Let’s get the biggest one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re going to choose based on size!? Weren’t you just worried over the design!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>The biggest one will be the most fun~ I’m sure of it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Oh well... Fine, let’s go with that then. Alright, let’s rent the biggest one and meet up with everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
